applet_name: SMS2Email: Forward your text messages to your email
applet_description: SMS2Email forwards the text messages you receive on your Android phone to your email account, so as long as your phone is connected to the internet, you can view your text messages on your tablet, computer, or anywhere you can access your email! Use our other recipe Email2SMS to send texts from your email.

applet_name: Get an email if it will rain tomorrow
applet_description: Don't get caught without an umbrella!

applet_name: Quickly email yourself a note
applet_description: For many people, their inbox is their todo list. Use this Note widget Applet to quickly email yourself notes, ideas, or things to remember.

applet_name: Get an email when Webhooks publishes a new trigger or action
applet_description: As we improve our service on IFTTT, we aim to publish new triggers or actions that you won't want to miss out on. Stay tuned!
applet_Trigger: New trigger or action published by service

applet_name: Spotify Alarm Clock
applet_description: I wanted to use Spotify as an alarm clock. Here's how I made that happen. https://gist.github.com/784de37358b27f5c7071

applet_name: Mail me free games with Steam keys posted to /r/gamedeals
applet_description: Free games on Steam!

applet_name: Get an email when a new Amazon Alexa Applet is published
applet_description: As we improve our service on IFTTT, we plan to publish new Applets that you won't want to miss out on. Stay tuned!

applet_name: Get an email with your current location
applet_description: When you press the button widget, IFTTT will send you an email with a map of your current location. This is a great way to share your location with someone else very easily.

applet_name: Get a daily 6:00 AM email with the weather report
applet_description: Every morning at 6:00AM you will receive an email with details about the day's weather forecast. Have a nice day!

applet_name: Get an email when there's a new tweet from a specific username
applet_description: Don't want to miss an amazing tweet from your mom/@Cher/@jack/[insert the username you want to watch here]? Use this Applet to get an email when they post!
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: Remote download to Google Drive
applet_description: Send an email to trigger@recipe.ifttt.com with an attachment or a file link in the message body. Optionally rename the file by entering the file name in the subject.

applet_name: Send an email to add a line to a google drive spreadsheet
applet_description: Send an email to add a line to a google drive spreadsheet

applet_name: Frost Alert!
applet_description: Winter draws on! This recipe is intended to warn me whenever I might need to take a few extra moments to de-ice the windscreen. Hope you find it useful.

applet_name: Use Email to send Telegram message
applet_description: Send an email to    trigger@applet.ifttt.com    with  "  #telegram  "  in the subject in order to trigger the IFTTT bot, then simply write your message as you would do for a regular email. Target chat needs to be choosen when you turn on the applet.

applet_name: Pixels Line notification Wifi 912 Camera
applet_description: Line notifications you when moving through the camera of Wifi 912 Camera

applet_name: Missed calls via email
applet_description: Missed calls via email

applet_name: Create new todo with an email
applet_description: Create new todo with an email

applet_name: Get an email when your EZVIZ camera senses motion
applet_description: This Applet monitors for when a specific alarm type is triggered then sends you an email as soon as possible.

applet_name: Send an email notification if your robot gets stuck
applet_description: Send an email reminder to free your robot when you get home.

applet_name: Email2SMS: Send text messages using your email
applet_description: Email2SMS allows you to send text messages using your Android phone's number anywhere you can access email as long as your phone is connected to the internet. How does it work? Step 1: Add this recipe to your IFTTT account. Step 2: Send an email to trigger@recipe.ifttt.com with the subject being the phone number and the body being the text of your message. Step 3: Use our recipe SMS2Email to forward text messages you receive on your phone to your email.

applet_name: Receive OTP as email
applet_description: Whenever you get an OTP sms for online transactions this applet will make sure you receive an email with the SMS so that you need not keep your phone close by or enter the OTP manually. Just copy the code from email and complete the transaction.

applet_name: Always be prepared for the weather
applet_description: Never get caught without a winter coat or umbrella! This Applet will send you a mobile notification, email, and create a calendar event when rain is in the forecast.

applet_name: Alexa find my (non-US) phone
applet_description: Use Alexa to find your cell phone via a text message if you are a Non-US user of the Amazon Echo. ( Currently Alexa triggers only work for US cell phones). Now you can use this if you are not a US owner of Alexa!

applet_name: Verizon Bill Outlook
applet_description: This notifies iOS when Verizon Bill email is fwd'd to recipes
applet_Action: Send a notification from the IFTTT app

applet_name: Get an email reminder a week before your wedding anniversary
applet_description: Customize this Applet with the date and time you want to be reminded, and you'll get a note so you don't forget to celebrate.

applet_name: When you receive an email attachment automatically save it to Dropbox
applet_description: Back up any attachment in your email account to the your Dropbox account.

applet_name: Email an entry to Day One
applet_description: Email trigger@recipe.ifttt.com and auto generate a Day One entry with text and an attached photo.

applet_name: Email me new iOS reminder
applet_description: Email me new iOS reminder

applet_name: Email me when doorbell rings
applet_description: If you have a Ring smart doorbell, add the channel and have it email you when the doorbell rings.  Useful for me when my mobile reception is poor just to know someone has been.

applet_name: Get an email when motion is detected at your front door
applet_description: Get an email alert when motion is detected by your SkyBell HD. Requires that the SkyBell HD motion sensor is set to "on".

applet_name: Receive Email When Temp Is Too Low
applet_description: Send an email when room temperature gets too low.

applet_name: Get an email when TechCrunch writes about a specific company
applet_description: Just pop in the company name you'd like to track, and articles in TC that mention it will be sent straight to your inbox.

applet_name: Ecobee Motion Detection
applet_description: Keep track of when your Ecobee motion detectors are triggered.

applet_name: Create Things to-dos from Amazon Alexa
applet_description: This Applet lets you create a new to-do in Things 3 via Amazon Alexa. It uses the Mail to Things feature introduced in Things 3 and automatically adds a new To-Do to your Things Inbox when you ask Alexa to Remind you about something.
applet_Trigger: Item added to your To Do List

applet_name: Message from DodsworthBrowne@gmail.com
applet_description: Messsage from DodsworthBrowne@gmail.com

applet_name: PLUNGE PRICING ALERT: Octopus Agile electricity just went below zero pence per kWh
applet_description: When renewable energy is high (such as very sunny days and very windy days) the wholesale price of electricity goes negative.  Here at Octopus Energy we pass that benefit straight on to you.  That means when the half-hourly price drops below zero you get PAID to use electricity which this Applet informs you about.  Get busy now!

applet_name: Frost can damage your plants!
applet_description: This recipe will email you when a low temperature below 34ËšF is forecasted for the next day. If it happens, then you should take steps to protect any plants that might get damaged by a frost. Learn a bit more http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frost

applet_name: Get an email when you receive a notification from a specific app
applet_description: Never miss a notification by sending yourself an email whenever you receive a notification from a specific app
applet_Trigger: Notification received from a specific app

applet_name: Email New Google Drive File
applet_description: Email New Google Drive File

applet_name: Subscribe to BrainyQuote's Quote of the Day
applet_description: You never know when you'll need a bon mot.

applet_name: Email Create Google Calendar Quick Add Event
applet_description: Email Create Google Calendar Quick Add Event

applet_name: Evernote To Do from email
applet_description: Forward an email with #todo in subject and a To Do checklist will be created/appended.

applet_name: Get an email when there's breaking NASA news
applet_description: Be the first to know important and exciting space-related news with this Applet that sends it straight to your inbox.

applet_name: Search for specific types of apps with a keyword
applet_description: Interested in new photography apps? What about strategy games? Enter a keyword or simple phrase below to search for new releases and updates in the App Store.

applet_name: Receive Email When Temp Is Too High
applet_description: Send an email when room temperature gets too high.

applet_name: Get an email whenever the U.S. President signs a bill into law
applet_description: You'll get the title of the law and a link to read more.
applet_Trigger: The president signs a new bill into law

applet_name: Force Gmail to check POP3 email account more frequently.
applet_description: Force Gmail to check POP3 email account more frequently.
